title: Otherworld
description: When a mysterious orphaned girl tells tales of mystical figures approaching her in the twilight, her grandparents are frightened to leave her alone on their farm. One morning, the child never rises from sleep and they find her staring at the ceiling with lifeless eyes. After her sudden death there are whispers among the townspeople that a changeling may have been left in her bed and that the girl was taken to the land beyond the world we know. Only her uncle dares to seek her, leaving behind everything he holds dear with the desperate hope of discovering the fate of the innocent child deep within the mythical realm of ancient Ireland.
author: Brian Clyde
